frontmatter.title: Authentication
frontmatter.metaDescription: Learn about the different options for authenticating with Azure Key Vault.

frontmatter.title: Authorization
frontmatter.metaDescription: Learn how to set the proper access rights to access Azure Key Vault secrets from Kubernetes.

frontmatter.title: Components
frontmatter.metaDescription: Learn about the different components of akv2k8s.

frontmatter.title: Examples
frontmatter.metaDescription: See different examples of how akv2k8s can be used.

frontmatter.title: How it Works
frontmatter.metaDescription: Learn about the inner workings of akv2k8s.

frontmatter.title: Introduction
frontmatter.metaDescription: Azure Key Vault to Kubernetes (akv2k8s) makes Azure Key Vault objects available to Kubernetes in a simple and secure way.

frontmatter.title: Installation
frontmatter.metaDescription: How to setup Azure Key Vault to Kubernetes

frontmatter.title: Known Issues
frontmatter.metaDescription: A list of known issues and available solutions or workarounds

frontmatter.title: Reference
frontmatter.metaDescription: See the complete reference and options for all akv2k8s resources.

frontmatter.title: Troubleshooting
frontmatter.metaDescription: Tips and trick for how to troubleshoot Azure Key Vault to Kubernetes.

frontmatter.title: Tutorials
frontmatter.metaDescription: A set of tutorials on how to get different Key Vault objects into Kubernetes.

frontmatter.title: Controller
frontmatter.metaDescription: Learn about the Controller for Azure Key Vault to Kubernetes.

frontmatter.title: Env Injector
frontmatter.metaDescription: Learn about the Env-Injector for Azure Key Vault to Kubernetes.

frontmatter.title: When to use which?
frontmatter.metaDescription: Learn when to use the controller or the env-injector with Azure Key Vault to Kubernetes.

frontmatter.title: Prerequisites
frontmatter.metaDescription: A set of commands to create all prerequisite resources needed to complete tutorials

frontmatter.title: Get Secret
frontmatter.metaDescription: Tutorial covering how to get a secret from Azure Key Vault into Kubernetes, either as a native Kubernetes secret or directly injected into a container.

frontmatter.title: Get Certificate
frontmatter.metaDescription: Tutorial covering how to get a certificate from Azure Key Vault into Kubernetes, either as a native Kubernetes secret or directly injected into a container.

frontmatter.title: Get Signing Key
frontmatter.metaDescription: Tutorial covering how to get signing key from Azure Key Vault into Kubernetes, either as a native Kubernetes secret or directly injected into a container.

frontmatter.title: Get Multi Value Secret
frontmatter.metaDescription: Tutorial covering how to get multi-value secret from Azure Key Vault into Kubernetes, either as a native Kubernetes secret or directly injected into a container.

frontmatter.title: Inject PFX Certificate
frontmatter.metaDescription: Tutorial covering how to directly inject PFX certificates into a container as a base64 encoded environment variable.
